item.title: Lecture 02 - Working with Data (Part 1)
item.description: Key Topics Analysis development ggplot2 here knitr R R projects reprex Reproducible Examples rmarkdown stlData Resources Open on Functions LP-02 Workflow - Projects Lecture Prep 02 Replication You should also check out the .Rmd replication file in the lecture-02 repository. Project Organization One of the topics we’ll cover this week is an extension of a reading from last week - how to organize projects.
